img_summary: The image depicts a set of seeds placed in a wooden tray, likely representing an in-game item from *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the preceding and following text, the seeds are part of a collection of uncommon items obtained through specific actions, such as gathering plants or defeating enemies. This particular seed is part of a sequence showcasing various collectible seeds, each tied to unique gameplay mechanics or locations.
